creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: procession of male and female figures in blue, green, yellow, red and black; from left to right:  pair of figures under a blue roof, fourteen mustached male figures facing right, green and red architectural element, crouching figure, five men with swords and other objects riding various animals (ox, elephant, tiger), nine musicians and flag bearers facing left, man in sedan begin carried by four attendants, man on horse, twelve women, ten men, seven smaller female figures--4 kneeling, three men, five men with round elements at their feet
title: Ceremonial handscroll
